github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Always generate commit messages in English.
Use types: feat, fix, docs, style, refactor, test, chore, perf, ci, build, revert
If the changed file is a documentation file, the commit message should start with 'docs'
Keep subject line under 50 characters and use imperative mood
Add body for complex changes explaining what and why, not how
Include breaking changes with 'BREAKING CHANGE:' footer if applicable
Reference issues with 'Closes #123' or 'Fixes #123' in footer
